title: (08140) Caldes de Montbui - Carrer de Bigues

title_short: (08140) Caldes de Montbui - 5 Carrer Torre Roja

name: Camping El Pasqualet
title: (08140) Camping El Pasqualet
description:
Perfect to visit Barcelona anytime during the year. 
Our camping is situated in Caldes de Montbui, Barcelona, in the middle of the gorgeous landscape of Vallès Oriental, at only 30 Km from Barcelona (by car or by bus). It's an ideal place to do excursions, enjoying the Farell's mountain, or just relax in the thermal baths of Caldes. 
We invite to you to enjoy some days of peace and tranquillity in touch with the nature! And everything really near from Barcelona.

title: (08140) Caldes de Montbui -
description: Small stretch of land between a couple of roads, surrounded by trees. We stayed to sleep and we were fine, yes it is true that the roads are somewhat frequented at night, but it was not a problem for us.

title: (08184) Palau-solità i Plegamans -

title_short: (08184) Palau-solità i Plegamans - 74 Carrer de la Pineda

title: (08181) Sentmenat - 41 Passeig del Castell
description: Wide soil parking next to the town’s castle. Plenty of space, easy access, and fairly leveled. Quiet at night with walkers and bike riders passing by during the day due to the proximity of little country paths.

title_short: (08184) Palau-solità i Plegamans - 42 Carrer de Manresa
description: Parking area in an undeveloped residential area. There are several streets where you can park without any buildings around. There are some fields, nature and nearby some houses. A quiet place to spend the night on the outskirts of town. Pay attention to the street where you park. Most are fortnightly parking, so depending on the day of the month you park on one side or the other of the street.

title: (08181) Sentmenat - Unnamed Road

title: (08186) Lliçà d'Amunt - 2 Carretera Granollers

title: (08211) Castellar del Vallés - Ronda Llevant
description: Large asphalted car park with little traffic (practically empty during the day except from 17 to 20 when some cars park there). Right next to a very large park with public fountains of drinking water. Bakery at the other end of the park 2 minutes, bars and cafes also nearby and the bus stop in the same parking. There is a bus line to Barcelona although the alternative is to go down to Sabadell and from there train or bus to the capital. In summer great water play area for children (and not so children ...). In full nature with many trails to practice sport and routes by bike and walking. Some motorhomes parked in the same street. Picnic tables in the park.

title: (08182) Sant Feliu de Codines - 3 Carretera Sant Miquel del Fai
title_short: (08182) Sant Feliu de Codines - 3 Carretera Sant Miquel del Fai
description: Parking on the way to Sant Miquel del Fai without services.

title_short: (08416) Riells del fai - 2P Avinguda Sant Vicenç
description: Riells del Fai. Parking without shade for the weekend. Near the Gorgs (natural pools) of the village river. There are several pools. A nice walk, Dogs allowed. Free You can take a dip you have to walk 15 minutes.

title: (08416) Bigues i Riells - 8 Carrer Doctor Zamenhof
title_short: (08416) Bigues i Riells - 8 Carrer Doctor Zamenhof
description: Almost flat dirt parking on the outskirts of town, discreet and quiet

title: (08202) Sabadell -

title_short: (08150) Parets del Vallès - 10 Avinguda de Francesc Macià

So it's just a little louder. Otherwise we had a quiet night and we were not disturbed in the morning either, despite many cars and an event in the building.

Gas station with LPG pump.
also had adapters for my non-spanish fitting.

description: Moto gp parking

title: (08420) Canovelles - 1L Carrer Indústria
description: It is a very fast and efficient service. I arrived full of mosquitoes and dirt and in the end it was like new. And they gave me a soft drink and a coffee!!! It's a great service BUT it's best to call first and make an appointment because otherwise you might be waiting a while behind a long line of trucks.

title: (08211) Castellar del Vallès -
description: Esplanade in the middle of nature, there is a river and picnic area.

title: (08211) Les Arenes -
description: A very nice place. The night was calm, you can hear the road in the distance but in the evening there is not much traffic. There is a river below and a spring/fountain next to it.

name: Área de Autocaravanas Granollers
title: (08401) Área de Autocaravanas Granollers
description: Motorhome area with 13 parking spaces DO NOT PUT BLACK WATER IN THE DRINKING WATER SUPPLY! It has a different place for that, right next to where organic matter is concerned. Maximum 4 days, bottle area every day. Big freeway next to heavy traffic all day

title: (08401) Granollers - Carrer de Joan Vinyoli, 2
description: Free public parking. 10 min from the center. Supermarkets and restaurants nearby.

title: (08100) Mollet del Vallès - 6 Avinguda de Rivoli
title_short: (08100) Mollet del Vallès - 6 Avinguda de Rivoli
description: Parking only during the day next to the Mollet soccer field. At the entrance there is a sign prohibiting parking from 11pm to 8am. It is located on the outskirts of the town, easy access. Ideal for a stopover or to spend the day. At the end of the parking lot there is a skatepark. There are garbage containers next to the entrance to the parking lot. The car park is surrounded by green areas, ideal for walking the dog. Behind the soccer field there is a pedestrian bridge that crosses the highway and leads to walking paths between the cultivated fields. At the access to the car park there are two concrete blocks that make the passage narrow. Vans fit but be careful.

title: (08207) Sabadell - 2 Carrer de la Segarra
description: Fabulous Self-Service Laundry with 12 and 16kg washers. And 18kg dryers. Ideal for washing and drying our clothes quickly. Highly recommended. Bars and supermarkets around to take advantage of the time.

title: (08207) Sabadell - 297 Avinguda de Matadepera
description: Gas station with laundry

title: (08208) Sabadell - 8 Plaça del Taulí
description: Parking in small garden. Good situation Very calm. With shadow. Very central. I arrived on a Saturday at 10 pm there were plenty of places to park

title: (08207) Sabadell - 177 Carretera Matadepera
description: Parking on the outskirts of Sabadell, near the church of San Julia, very quiet site of land and little shade.

title: (08401) Granollers - 37 Carrer Ripollès
description: Area next to the Lledoner park, quiet and ideal for a stop on the road, picnic area, pee can, and playground. Without services

title: (08530) L'Ametlla del Vallès - Unnamed Road
description:
Nice quiet spot to park during the day or spend the night. Very few locals people pass by on the next morning. No services. Close to l'atmella village, you can slightly hear the highway.
The access is through a dusty road that doesn't appear in google maps as a road. Easy access even for big vans.

title: (08207) Sabadell - 98 Diseminado Masia Can Deu
description: Area outside Sabadell (Barcelona) where you can enjoy free parking, as well as tables and barbecue for rent. 5 minutes from Sabadell center and 30 minutes from BCN. No service. There is a mosque. It's right at the entrance of the forest where you can ejoy a walk. Perfect for sleeping and ideal for a stop.

title: (08202) Sabadell - 30 Diseminado del Ripoll Riu
description: Secluded parking area, with a river 1 minute walk, very quiet and secluded area

title: (08202) Sabadell - 73 Carrer de Bonavista
description: Land parking in front of the UAB Sabadell campus. There are containers and wifi from the university a few meters away, it can be accessed as a guest. Trafficked in the mornings by people walking dogs. There is a bakery right in front but it has no wifi.

title: (08520) Corró d'Avall - s/n Camí Antic de Vic

description: It is the parking of the park of Falgar I la Verneda, very large with many games for children, a lake and a bird's-eye viewpoint.  Pass the Congost River to the side.  (The Police do not allow camping or overnight).

name: Càmping L'Illa
title: (08189) Càmping L'Illa
description: The Camping "L'illa" is located 40 km from Barcelona in the middle of the mountain at 600 m altitude, next to the river Tenes and Sant Miquel del Fai. It is a family campsite and very welcoming. Located in a beautiful spot and starting point for multiple excursions and surrounded by nature, it offers comfortable facilities such as swimming pools, restaurant, football field, petanque, table tennis etc. and all the necessary services to make your stay as pleasant as possible. It is open 11 months, summer season and weekends, bridges and holidays all year. Pets are allowed.

title: (08206) Sabadell - unnamed road
description: Supermarket, public transport, public park. Near the city center.

title: (08402) Granollers - 18 Avinguda Sant Esteve
description: Self-service laundry "Lavarapid". They have 6 washers and 3 dryers. Payment by bank card or coins.

title_short: (08530) La Garriga - 92F Carrer del Mil·lenari de Catalunya

title: (08402) Granollers - 2 Carrer d'Isaac Albéniz

The services consist of gray water and waste water emptying and water filling. The pitch is in a quiet location 10 minutes walk from the village. In the area there are two playgrounds and two fountains, all next to the Masia Can Terres, supermarket and laundry nearby.

description: Municipal parking

title_short: (08160) Montmeló - 8 Polígon Pol17 el Pedregar Indu

We spent one night in the area. There is noise from the road but there is enough space to park.
We were several campers there.

title: (08160) Montmeló - 6 Passeig de les Corts Catalanes
title_short: (08160) Montmeló - 6 Passeig de les Corts Catalanes
description: LAUNDRY The value for money in this laundromat is really very good. 2 euros for 20 minutes dryer is really great!?? All (2 washing machines at 10 kg / 1 WM at 12 kg 1 WM at 16 kg / 2 dryers at 18 kg) are paid directly at the machine. It only works with 1 EUR coins. There is a machine on the wall that changes bills. Detergent is included. You cannot add your own detergent. But it smells moderate. Not too strong.

title: (08130) Santiga - Unnamed Road
description:
Lovely parking lot surrounded by trees and shade. Perfect to spend a night if you pass through here.
Quiet place next to a church.

description: Street at the back of Parque Cataluña, with many places where trailers, buses, etc. are used to parking. A ten minute walk are the public toilets of the park itself (although they have opening hours). It is a place with an average influx of vehicles.

title: (08530) La Garriga - 130 Carrer dels Banys

description: Parking for mobile homes in the area immediately to the right of the entrance to the recycling center. Warning: deactivate the pop-up blocker beforehand, otherwise the payment page will be blocked! About 25 minutes from Barcelona, emptying of gray and black water. Large car park, neighborhood playground with basketball and football. With the S/U Bahn you can easily get to Barcelona. Stop p, gracia is centrally located. S/u bahn station montmelo about 10 minutes walk from the square.

title: (08530) La Garriga - 82 Carrer Can Basal
description: It consists of an open field, practically in the center of the town of La Garriga ... Nearby there are parks for children, a gas station, bike path, paths towards the mountain, ... If you walk about 500 meters you will reach the center of the town, where it is always very lively ... there are shops of all kinds and bars / restaurants. In summer, at the end of July / beginning of August it is usually the biggest party, and the parties are just held in this field, just in case, if it falls in those times consult the website of the town hall.

title: (08189) Sant Quirze Safaja - Unnamed Road

title: (08520) Corró d'Avall - 737 Diseminado Corro de Vall
title_short: (08520) Corró d'Avall - 737 Diseminado Corro de Vall

title_short: (08170) Montornès del Vallès - 6 Polígon P.I.Can Buscarons de B

There are toilets (free) 24 hours a day, showers  from 7:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m., garbage containers, an area for emptying gray and black water and a fountain for filling clean water. In total there are about 35 or 40 parking spaces. You can perfectly spend the night.

description: Ideal area to eat and rest. It has tables and stone benches, barbecues, chiringuito, children's play area and plenty of pine trees.

title: (08205) Sabadell - 50 Carrer Regne Unit
description: Park area of ​​Can Gambus. Asphalted parking near the highway. With water from sources and quiet area. Lawn and tranquility. Without height limits. It is not a bad area to spend the night.

title: (08105) Sant Fost de Campsentelles - 190 Carrer Barcelona
title_short: (08105) Sant Fost de Campsentelles - 190 Carrer Barcelona
description: Pressure washing center AC wash with walkway height 5m. Washers and dryers. Pet wash 24h. Clean water point. Next to the Lidl.

title: () Valldoriolf -
description:
Are you looking for a safe and quiet place near Barcelona? Here you can spend the night because you don't need much to travel!

IMPORTANT: During this summer, since there are not many shady areas, it is better to avoid being there between 11 in the morning and 8 in the afternoon.

To contact do it only via whatsapp, telegram, signal or email. Not calls. Thank you. Riki.

There is a bus stop (400) 1.5 km away that goes directly to BCN. It takes 30 minutes and costs €4.5/person.

The Montmeló circuit is 3km away. You can walk safely.

title: (08205) Sabadell - 52 Carrer Domènech i Montaner
description: Car wash with pressure hose and 1 meter high walkway to reach the ceiling, not very high, but better than nothing!

title: (08230) Matadepera - 5 Carrer dels Lledoners
description: Land parking of the municipal golf club. there are no services but it gets you out of a hurry. very close to the center of the town of Matadepera. We were one night and very quiet.

title: (08210) Barberà del Vallès - Carrer Verneda
description: It is an area of orchards that is crossed by a river, there is a small picnic area and at night there is a good area for animals to spend the night. Sometimes they make a bottle. Free

title: (08227) Terrassa - 6 Torre Mossen Homs
description: Drinking water point to recharge.

title: (08227) -

title_short: (08130) Santa Perpètua de Mogoda - 5 Passeig de Can Taió
description: Parking quiet area, bike lane and very cool park, I have slept and nobody has told me, there are several bars nearby, there is also a supermarket in the street behind, it is a quiet residential area, so you have to take care not to dirtying or putting up mess since the neighbors would call the authorities. Relatively close to the AP-7 motorway, a good area to rest before visiting Barcelona. There is a fountain nearby. I emphasize respect for the environment and the neighbors.

title: (08430) La Torreta - C-1415c

description: Laundry: washing machine (19kg, 14kg, 9kg) and dryer (19kg)

title: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - BV-5159

Inside the enclosure there are bathrooms, beach bars, meals (chickens, pizza, salad, pancakes, ice cream...) It is an ideal place to spend the day with children and our 4-legged friends. It is suitable for people with disabilities.

title: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - 9507 Carrer del Moianès
title_short: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - 9507 Carrer del Moianès
description: Parking near the cemetery, quiet ideal for a stop; supermarket at 1 km; shady; near center and assembly hall.

title_short: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - 71 Ronda de Santa Julita

title: (08410) Vilanova del Vallès - BV-5159
description:
Hello! We are the Pedrón de Sande family (Eli, Alfred and Pau who is 4 and a half years old, also "Suro" a super good and sociable puppy and Lluna a 7 month old border colie puppy).
We live in the middle of cultivated fields and forests. Our life system is slowlife and we would love to receive you on our land.
The location is surrounded by fields and forest. There are no industrial noises and very few cars pass through the area.
The land we offer is flat with short grass, access is super easy.
There is no hot water but you have several outlets outside.
You have available the WiFi of the house with a good connection.
Regarding rules, we want to promote common sense: use electricity conscientiously, garbage collection, collection of
animal droppings, respect the rest of the family that lives in the house.
Always welcome! Greetings.

title: (08410) Vilanova del Vallès - 2 Carrer Noruega
description: MODIFICATION: not suitable for motorhomes. Due to the absence of signage throughout the municipality and following a comment, I have reviewed the municipal ordinance and it indicates that motorhomes can only park next to the cultural center and the parking lot next to the town hall. Vans or vehicles approved as residential vehicles are not considered in the ordinance, so they can park here. Beautiful place in the middle of the forest, secluded and quiet. It is reached by a dirt track in good condition from the school road. The place is on the right hand side going down the road. There are other flat spaces to park on the same path a few meters before this location. ATTENTION! Be careful with Google Maps, if you put this location it can take you to another place or by another path. The only viable access is from the school. Mark the school as the destination to arrive correctly. Then take the dirt road going straight. No services but good coverage. Let's keep the place clean for everyone to enjoy.

You can't go on the last weekend of August because they hold the town's biggest festival and close the area and prohibit driving through the streets near the car park.

title: (08445) Cànoves - 6 Avinguda Josep Crous
description:
Forbidden for motorhomes from 00h until 07h.

Large parking lot to visit the town, with good restaurants, bakery farm of 10, little shops and pizzeria opposite. Next to it, a very cool children's park, a sports track and a great skate park for children. Very cool fountain below the parking lot. From the right side of the town square, the route to the Vallforners reservoir starts along the stupendous stream, passing through bridges and wooden walkways, where you can get soaked along the way. The bad thing is that there is not much shade in summer in this car park. A site 10. There are no emptying services or water.

There is no height limit

There are large spaces for trucks or buses in case you go with a large motorhome

Mercadona less than 5min and laundry less than 7
